answer:
QUESTION
1. we kept a dog in our house for safety purporse only, it stays outside of the house only(In a compound only), in this situation can we can keep dog or not??
and everybody we love dogs& cats. or jinn, angels will not come to our house???

2. is life insurance is haram? and why? if haram what is the alternative solution for it.
ANSWER


Share:

1. You are allowed to keep dogs for security purposes provided they do not enter the house. Also, be extremely cautious about their Najaasat. If they are not within the actual house, the angels of mercy will still come.

2. Life insurance is prohibited in Islam. Your trust should lie solely in Allah.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Muhammad Kadwa
FATWA DEPT.
